import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
import com.lucidworks.searchhub.analytics._
val mailData = SearchHubLoader.loadFromSolr(SearchHubLoader.Config(sqlContext)).filter("_lw_data_source_pipeline_s = 'mailing-list-default'").filter("isBot = false").select("id", "from_email", "threadId", "subject_simple", "publishedOnDate", "in_reply_to", "project")
val userItemCount = mailData.withColumnRenamed("threadId", "threadId_s").withColumnRenamed("subject_simple", "subject_simple_s").withColumnRenamed("from_email", "from_email_s").groupBy("threadId_s", "subject_simple_s", "from_email_s").count()
userItemCount.withColumnRenamed("count", "weight_d").write.format("solr").options(Map("zkhost" -> "localhost:9983", "collection" -> "lucidfind_signals_aggr")).mode(org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode.Overwrite).save
com.lucidworks.spark.util.SolrSupport.getCachedCloudClient("localhost:9983").commit("lucidfind_signals_aggr")
